title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama CLI and server for running large language models locally; supports Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma and more.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python library for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; works in Node, Bun, Deno and browsers (via proxy).

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration for Ollama; use any LangChain abstraction (LLM, chat, embeddings) with local Ollama models.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Full-featured ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama; markdown, code highlighting, model manager, multi-user.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; fluent API, streaming, embeddings, list/pull/delete models.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community Rust CLI that wraps the Ollama REST API with fuzzy-find model selection and chat REPL.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into a GitHub Copilot replacement; inline suggestions and chat panel.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU/node-selector support and horizontal scaling.

title: ollama-chatbot-ui
summary: Next.js chatbot starter that connects to Ollama; server-sent events, markdown, Dockerized.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG pipeline using Ollama for embeddings & generation, Chroma for vector store, and LangChain.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that lets servers chat with local Ollama models; slash commands, thread support, rate limiting.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up Ollama as a CI service; run model tests or generate docs inside pipelines.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack bot for Ollama; mentions or DM to chat, supports code blocks, thread replies, ephemeral messages.

title: ollama-telegram
summary: Telegram bot with group & private chat support, streaming replies, per-user model selection, and admin whitelist.

title: ollama-nvidia
summary: Official guide for running Ollama with NVIDIA GPUs; Docker runtime, CUDA requirements, performance tuning.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that adds an Ollama sidebar assistant; summarize notes, brainstorm ideas, or translate text.

title: ollama-logseq
summary: LogSeq plugin to chat with your knowledge base via Ollama; block selection, prompt templates, inline generation.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET 8 client for Ollama; async streaming, cancellation tokens, strongly-typed chat and embeddings.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing async/sync wrappers over Ollama REST API; tokio & reqwest, embed macro for models.
